page.title: 05POLICE
page.content: PC HODGSON LIKED CATCHING CRIMINALS, HE DISLIKED THE PAPERWORK. HE GOT TWO DAYS OFF A WEEK. HE OFTEN GOT SCARED HE LIKES HIS UNIFORM BUT HE DISLIKED HIS TIE. HE LAST WORKED AT BARROW AND HE LIKES THE POLICE FORCE. SERGEANT McCAFFERTY LIKED CYCLING PROFICIENCY AND HIS UNIFORM. HE DISLIKED WORKING NIGHT SHIFT AND HIS HELMET. HE GOT EIGHT DAYS OFF A MONTH. HE LAST WORKED AT WHITEHAVEN AND MARY PORT. HE OFTEN GOT SCARED, AND HE LIKED THE FORCE. INSPECTOR FURNESS ANSWERED A FEW QUESTIONS ON MILLOM POLICE. EIGHT POLICEMEN AND TWO SERGEANTS WORK FROM MILLOM. THEY ALSO HAVE A DETECTIVE.ONE VEHICLE IN MILLOM DOES 2500 MILES A MONTH. THE MAIN CRIME IS PETTY THEFT AND DAMAGE. THEY GET ABOUT 12 HOUSE ROBBERIES AND ABOUT 12 CAR ROBBERIES A YEAR AND ABOUT 68 SHOP ROBBERIES A YEAR.
